import wiki.type.Page
import wiki.type.Num

func num add(num a,num b) 
        return a + b
end

func printArr(num arr[])
        for(num i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) 
                print(arr[i])
        end
        print("\n")
end

//comment test
//multiple func test
func num sub(num c,num d)
        return c - d
end

//void func test
func println(string word)
        print(word + "\n")
end
//func overloading test
func println(num word)
        print(word + "\n")
end

//func string test
func string strcat(string pre, string suf)
        return pre + suf
end

main()
num a = 5 + 5

print(a)
print("\n")
println(b)

                print(i)
        else
